sources.title: Houman Seyyedi Talks To CWB
sources.description: Houman Seyyedi talks to CWB About his work as filmmaker and actor By Bijan Tehrani, Cinema Without Border (CWB) 10/17/2017 Feature Story, Videos I knew Houman Seyyedi as a very talented actor until I learned about him as a film director and then came the big suprise. After watching the four movies that has been released from Houman as a filmmaker, I was amazed by the freshness of his approach to filmmaking and new ideas and his great use of language of cinema in telling his stories. Letâ€™s not forget that filmmakers like Abbas Kiarostami had taken the first steps in this rout. I wish more success for Iranian cinema in the future...
